analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/27/0x802e50a4c19870d86a7e17c0740036ba7336a739.sol:
	Contract ImperiumCoin has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/27/0x802e50a4c19870d86a7e17c0740036ba7336a739.sol#258-259)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x802e50a4c19870d86a7e17c0740036ba7336a739.sol#92-93) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned._transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/27/0x802e50a4c19870d86a7e17c0740036ba7336a739.sol#97-98) is not in mixedCase
